attributes.action: Prevent the sale of Cadburys and protect one of the remaining crown jewels in our dwindling independent industry
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We need iconic British brands to remain British, in order to protect our identity and give the British people something to feel Great about.  The negative impact of losing such companies, through job losses and the demoralisation of the public should far outweigh any short term financial gains in the City.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
